description: Get the SDK that lets you integrate ArcGIS functionality into Windows Store, Windows Phone, and Windows Desktop apps. Use a wide range of mapping and GIS tasks online or offline, including editing, geocoding, routing, mapping, and data visualization.
releaseNotes: Support for Windows Desktop in this NuGet package does not include Local Server. Local Server functionality is only available with the complete SDK install.  To access additional SDK components, such as Local Server, military symbol dictionaries, application and item templates, a Visual Studio deployment experience, and localized resources, download and install the ArcGIS Runtime SDK for .NET: http://links.esri.com/dotnetsdk.
summary: ArcGIS Runtime for Windows Store, Windows Phone, and Windows Desktop
title: ArcGIS Runtime SDK for .NET
